'''''Minecraft: The Manga'' Volume 5''' is the fifth {{W|tankōbon}} volume of the ''[[Minecraft: The Manga]]'' series.

== Chapters ==
*21. Entering the Nether World!! (ネザーワールドに突入!!, ''Nezāwārudo ni Totsunyū!!'')
*22. A Strong Enemy Appears!! Blue Scorcing Heat!! (強敵出現!! 青い灼熱のプレイズ!!, ''Kyōteki Shutsugen!! Aoi Shakunetsu no Pureizu!!'')
*23. Get Rich Quirk!? Amethyst Excavation!! (一攫千金!? アメジスト発掘!!, ''Ikkakusenkin!? Amejisuto Hakkutsu!!'')
*24. Tame the Runaway Goat!! (暴走ヤギを手なずけろ!!, ''Bōsō Yagi o Tenazu Kero!!'')
*25. Follow in the Footsteps of Your Great Father!! (偉大な父の背中を追え!!, ''Idaina Chichi no Senaka o Oe!!'')
